# FTdata

This is an R Markdown format used for publishing markdown documents to GitHub. When you click the **Knit** button all R code chunks are run and a markdown file (.md) suitable for publishing to GitHub is generated.

## Installation

You can install `FTdata` from github with:

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("trinecosmusnobel/FTdata")
```

## Example

Retrieve all data of type "debat".

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
ft.retrieve(search.type = "debat")
```

Retrieve all data of type "aktør" where first name includes "mette".

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
retrieve_filtered(search.type = "aktør", fornavn = "mette")
```
